creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: black cotton full apron banded on sides and top with striped and geometric embroidered tape; wider bottom tape is embroidered in star shapes in orange, green and blue; narrow embroidered neck loop; side string ties; black lining
title: Apron
